text:
They’ll need to buy going back to October 2023. We are using Azure Arc to
license for our on-prem servers, and it is a monthly subscription charge. Once
you decommission a 2012 R2 server and deactivate the license in Azure Arc, the
charges stop for that license. 
Mark A. PuchalskiSenior Network Services
Manager___________________________________HONIGMAN LLP

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
metadata.email_text_original:
They’ll need to buy going back to October 2023.  We are using Azure Arc to
license for our on-prem servers, and it is a monthly subscription charge.  Once
you decommission a 2012 R2 server and deactivate the license in Azure Arc, the
charges stop for that license. 
Mark A. PuchalskiSenior Network Services
Manager___________________________________HONIGMAN LLP
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.honigman.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Caa44e30198e644a669fc08dc26898503%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638427619289494354%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gk8t5adgDdmzqu5Dn5DnauDUIOklBxGJUzWZOTeZGDM%3D&reserved=0] O
